item.description:
For benefit of Alternative House, a Womens shelter for Abused and At Risk Women.

Let's keep our Walking group going, for a good cause. AND, we can have dessert after dinner with no GUILT!

 

Please join me on a 5K walk, or join others on a 10K race.  The proceeds are for such a good cause, I could not be sleeping in when I can join others for this fund raiser.  I hope some of you will be in town and be able to join me.

 

For information and to pre-register click on this link.

http://alternative-house.org/thanks4giving

This is a cross posted event with Meeting and Greeting in So. NH & Merrimack Valley.

Call my cell when you get there so we can connect.

978-808-4974 Gloria GG

603-247-0897, Claire P (Other Organizer)

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: 5K Walk or 10K Run on Thanksgiving Morning in Lowell, MA
